import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import "./messenger.css"; import Navbar from "../../react-components/navbar/Navbar.js"; import Conversation from '../../react-components/conversations/Conversation'; import Message from '../../react-components/message/Message'; import OnlineChat from '../../react-components/onlineChat/OnlineChat'; import { AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext'; function Messenger() { const {user} = useContext(AuthContext); console.log(user); return ( <>
) } export default Messenger;
